about_the_game:
Journey to the 41st millennium and experience it in all of its grimdark glory with the original Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 soundtrack, bringing you 29 majestic tracks by composers Nima Fakhrara, Steve Molitz and Vikram Shankar (Silent Skies).

Combining thunderous, warring drums with raucous, adrenaline-infused strings and brass, the Space Marine 2 OST captures the galactic scale of war, the immediate peril facing humanity and the superhuman power of the Space Marines like never before.

Tracks are available in MP3, WAV and FLAC formats.
